Description: WASHBURN - SAMMY HAGAR - RED ROCKER RR100 ELECTRIC/ACOUSTIC GUITAR You are bidding on this awesome WASHBURN - SAMMY HAGAR - RED ROCKER RR100 ELECTRIC/ACOUSTIC GUITAR!!! This fine axe features an awesome transparent red flame top, a Fishman piezo acoustic pickup & a Seymour Duncan designed "Hot Rail" style electric pickup! Check out these awesome Features: Transparent Red Flame TopRosewood fretboardPearl Dot inlaysSide Dot fret markersSet-Neck Construction24.75" scale neck22 Medium-Jumbo fretsSeymour Duncan Designed, "Hot Rail" style electric pickupFishman piezo acoustic pickup 1 volume, 1 treble, 1 bass and 1 pickup blender controlChrome, Dome knurled knobsWashburn Butterfly bridge Grover tuning machinesSoftshell gig bag included This fine axe was among the best of the import models Sammy Hagar made with Washburn. It has a stunning red flame top that looks a lot better in person plus the tonal versatility of having a searing hot electric pickup & a great sounding acoustic pickup. The Seymour Duncan Designed, "Hot Rail" style electric pickup has a surprisingly hot & high output sound for its size & the Fishman piezo acoustic pickup has an awesome & clean acoustic tone. The pickup blender control allows you to switch from a pure electric or acoustic sound to a blended sound between the electric & acoustic pickups. You can go from playing "One Way To Rock" to "Eagles Fly" at the turn of a knob, how cool is that?! This guitar plays great, sounds awesome & is very easy & fun to play. If Sammy Hagar put his name on it, you know it has to be good! This fine guitar was lightly played & is in excellent condition in all respects. It is time for someone else to enjoy this awesome guitar. This awesome axe would make the perfect gift for that special Sammy Hagar fan or perhaps for yourself. Check my 100% positive feedback & bid with confidence. Shipping is $55 flat to the lower 48 USA. Shipping outside of the lower 48 USA is $105 plus any additional applicable fees. Please check out my other auctions for more cool stuff up for grabs. Thanks for looking & Bid to Win!!!
